title.value: Data Standards Wales Document Attribute Value

description.value: This extension carries the Value value recorded against the document attribute. This is modelled as a string format for flexibility. The actual datatype of the value will depend upon the specific document attribute. For example some may be dates, other integers and others a fixed list of codes.

purpose.value: Provides flexibility, where applicable, to store a range of document metadata not accommodated elsewhere.

short.value: The value recorded against the document attribute.
